game.name: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake is a remake of the second entry in the well-known and popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous undead monsters standing in your way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake is a remake of the second entry in the well-known and popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous undead monsters standing in your way.

reviewHighlights.text: 1편도 구린 부분이 있지만 그래도 나름 즐겼는데 2편은 1편 이하임. 특히 총 타격감이 최악.
